name: Outpost Unknown (VR Prototype)
description:
Yet another half-finished game for Meta-Fest #3 this time.

The story so far:
Space Command has dispatched you and your crew to re-establish communication with a research and development outpost that mysteriously went dark a few weeks ago.

So, ya'll head on over there... there's nothing on the coms... and as you're authenticating with the Orbital Defense System (so as to get a closer look), it suddenly disconnects from you and starts firing...

Somehow you survived the crash (there's supposed to be a zombie crew and pilot, but there's not, sorry, ran out of time)... what do you do now?

Gameplay:
Find computer Consoles around the ship and the base to discover what you can about the fate of this lost outpost!  (Seriously, there's like 3 or 4 consoles... it's really not done you guys).

Collect weapons (er... the same weapon over and over, because... time. lol -- man, I really wanted to do a full FPS arsenal though 😅) -- and health packs -- you have two hands and two pockets to hold all various items you might pick up! (Don't waste items, if you die, you respawn and knowing where the extras are will be useful.)

You can also fool around climbing around on the structures and exploring the valley and and stuff...

Controls:

  • Sticks to move and turn.
  • Grips and Triggers to pick up or drop most things (including to/from lockers or pockets).
  • Grips for climbing...
  • Triggers to shoot or use health packs if you're holding them.  (You can up your health slightly past 100% with health packs, but if you're at the max, then nothing will happen, so you can just put it back in your pocket).
  • Anything that's yellow and glowly (like your pockets or locker slots, or the locker handles, or the buttons on the computers) are things that you can interact with (for slots, you can put or take items from them, for the handles you can yank them open or closed, and for the buttons, you can press them -- like with your hand, or a gun... or a bullet...)

Still no sound, not even finishable this time...

Bleh... as always: if only I had another 2 weeks. 😅

Good luck everyone! 🙂
